author: Hblightguy
post_text: May 19, 2016 at 4:44 AM#1Is there a thread or manual on macro creation from the command line? I'm looking for a way to add lines to macros and edit the cmd in them at line.End goal is creating a macro that can auto write other macros.I.e auto create 6 macros that each assign a preset to a fixture.I can't seem to find the syntax anywhere.
title: Macro Creation From Command line
